remarks: The value of the projection map.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjhfval $p |- ( H e. CH -> ( projh ` H ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( iota_ z e. H E. y e. ( _|_ ` H ) x = ( z +h y ) ) ) ) $.
$d H x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
